gameState

Class GameStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameState.GameStateManager

  • public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class uses an ArrayList to hold all the GameStates so they can be accessed both forward and backward. Can switch from state to state easily.
    Author:
    Alex Xu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LEVEL1STATE 
      static int MENUSTATE
      static integers for the index of the menu and first level states

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameStateManager()
      creates an ArrayList of GameStates to hold all the levels in addition to the MenuState and HelpState initializes the MenuState, HelpState and Level1State

        i - number of the next level
